name: Early QA Notification for Significant Rewrites
description: Update pipeline process so that Restructure-classified files in the tech approach trigger an early notification to Enzo, allowing him to begin regression test planning before implementation is complete. Builds on the completed tech-approach-update project.

tasks.title: Scope requirements and implement process documentation updates

Wrote requirements doc with clear problem statement, scope, and 4 acceptance criteria (CLAUDE.md, kickoff skill, Thomas agent def, Enzo agent def)

decisions: Combined PM scoping and implementation into one step — all changes are process documentation, no architecture or code needed. Andrei not required.
Early notification is non-blocking and conditional — only triggered by Restructure flags, does not delay the pipeline
Notification content is minimal: file names, classification, QA impact notes. No formal regression plan document required from Enzo.
Only Restructure triggers early notification, not Modify. Modify risk is moderate and doesn't warrant the overhead.
Thomas checks for Restructure flags and reports to CEO who handles notification, consistent with the pipeline orchestration model where CEO spawns agents
